title: Kerber [classic / refined / serif / slab]
content:
Hello typophiles,

Any chance of identifying this font please? It can be found on [www.kerber.se](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063242/http:/www.kerber.se/ "www.kerber.se")

Many thanks, have a great week!

Paul

Font: 

 Dala Floda 

Solved By:
